# volcenginecc_iam_project (Resource)

资源项目（Project）是提供的一种资源分组管理的机制，帮助您达成逻辑层面的资源隔离，您能够通过资源项目进行项目制授权和分账等操作。

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "volcenginecc_iam_project" "IAMProjectDemo" {
  description         = "IAMProjectDemo description"
  project_name        = "default"
  display_name        = "IAMProjectDemo"
  parent_project_name = "default"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `project_name` (String) 项目名称

### Optional

- `description` (String) 描述
- `display_name` (String) 展示名
- `parent_project_name` (String) 父项目名称

### Read-Only

- `account_id` (Number) 账号ID
- `created_time` (String) 创建时间
- `has_permission` (Boolean) 是否可见
- `id` (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.
- `path` (String) 项目路径
- `status` (String) 启用状态
- `updated_time` (String) 更新时间

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
$ terraform import volcenginecc_iam_project.example "project_name"
```
